CustomField.formula: if ( CONTAINS( Name, "COGS : Operations and Shipping"), "Operations and Shipping", if( CONTAINS( Name, "COGS : Professional Services & Support"), "Professional Services & Support", if( CONTAINS(Name, "Sales & Marketing : Sales"), "Sales", if( CONTAINS(Name, "Sales & Marketing : Business Development"), "Business Development", if (CONTAINS(Name, "Sales & Marketing : Marketing"), "Marketing", if (CONTAINS(Name, "Sales & Marketing : Product Marketing"), "Product Marketing", if( CONTAINS(Name, "Research & Development : Product Management"), "Product Management", if (CONTAINS(Name, "Research & Development : Engineering"), "Engineering", if ( CONTAINS( Name, "Research & Development : Engineering : Appliance Engineering"), "Appliance Engineering", if (CONTAINS(Name, "Research & Development : Engineering : Legal Engineering"), "Legal Engineering", if(CONTAINS(Name, "Research & Development : Engineering : Quality Assurance"), "Quality Assurance", if(CONTAINS(Name, "General & administrative : CEO"), "CEO", if(CONTAINS(Name, "General & administrative : Finance & Admin"), "Finance & Admin", null)))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Sub Department
